title: authentication
description: A full-stack authentication project built with Node.js (Express) REST API for the backend and Next.js for the frontend. This project demonstrates secure user login and registration flows using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and OAuth 2.0 providers (e.g., Google, GitHub) and resend to send OTP to reset password.

title: multer configuration
description: A Node.js project demonstrating how to configure Multer for handling file uploads and integrate with Cloudinary for cloud-based storage. This project provides a clean and scalable solution for managing user-uploaded files such as images, documents, or media.

title: mongodb connection
description: A simple project demonstrating how to connect a MongoDB database using Mongoose in a Node.js environment and perform CRUD operation. This serves as a starter template for developers who want to learn or implement database connectivity with MongoDB.

title: PostgreSQL connection
description: A simple project demonstrating how to connect a PostgreSQL database using Prisma ORM in a Node.js environment and perform CRUD operation. This serves as a starter template for developers who want to learn or implement database connectivity with Prisma.

title: Vanilla GraphQL API Development
description: DA lightweight project showcasing how to build a GraphQL API in Node.js using vanilla GraphQL. This template provides a clean, minimal setup thatâ€™s perfect for learning the fundamentals of GraphQL.

title: Apollo GraphQL API Development
description: A project demonstrating how to build a GraphQL API using Apollo Server with Node.js.
